EMtree 0.1.0
  • Reference

Computes edges probability

EMtree.Rd

Computes edges probability

EMtree(PLNobject, maxIter = 30, cond.tol = 1e-10, verbatim = TRUE,
  plot = FALSE)

Arguments

PLNobject

an object resulting from the use of the `PLN` function from package `PLNmodels`
maxIter

Maximum number of iterations for EMtree
cond.tol

Tolerence parameter for the conditionement of psi matrix
verbatim

talks if set to TRUE
plot

plots likelihood if set to TRUE

Value

  • edges_prob: p x p matrix of edges probabilities

  • edges_weight: p x p matrix of edges weights for any spanning tree

  • logpY: vector of log-likelihoods

  • maxIter: final number of iterations EMtree has ran

  • timeEM: EMtree computation time

  • alpha: data signal/noise ratio

Examples

n=30
p=10
Y=data_from_scratch("tree",p=p)$data
PLN_Y = PLNmodels::PLN(Y~1)
#> 
#>  Initialization...
#>  Adjusting a PLN model with full covariance model
#>  Post-treatments...
#>  DONE!
EMtree(PLN_Y,verbatim=TRUE, plot=TRUE)
